org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi

Class JAServiceTracker<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase
      • org.agilewiki.jactor2.osgi.JAServiceTracker<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the service interface.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.util.EventListener, Blade, org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener

    public class JAServiceTracker<T>
extends BladeBase
implements org.osgi.framework.ServiceListener, java.lang.AutoCloseable
    Tracks OSGi services, reacting to OSGi's Service events, and publishes all the matching services using thread-safe blade requests. The (single) listener must implement ServiceChangeReceiver interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class org.agilewiki.jactor2.core.blades.BladeBase

        BladeBase.AsyncBladeRequest<RESPONSE_TYPE>, BladeBase.SyncBladeRequest<RESPONSE_TYPE>

      The bundle context of the *processing's bundle*.

      The actual expected type of the service(s).
      private boolean closed
      Have we been closed (or failed)?
      private java.lang.String listenerFilter
      LDAP filter, used to match Service instance(s).
      private org.slf4j.Logger log
      Logger for this object.
      private ServiceChangeReceiver<T> serviceChangeReceiver
      The ServiceChangeReceiver that sent the start request.
      private boolean started
      Have we received the start request?
      private java.util.HashMap<org.osgi.framework.ServiceReference,T> tracked
      Keeps a mapping from ServiceReferences to actual service instances.
